detailsData.title: Seasoned Litigators
detailsData.content: Experienced in trying cases in every county in the San Francisco Bay Area and the United States District Court.

detailsData.title: Insightful Case Planning
detailsData.content: Emphasis on practical case planning, working closely with clients to present their interests effectively.

detailsData.title: Community Service
detailsData.content: Individually serving the community with nonprofit and pro bono work, believing in a work/life balance.

address: 411 Borel Ave Suite 425, San Mateo, Ca 94402
valueProp: Farbstein & Blackman is a preeminent civil litigation law firm in Northern California, recognized for its seasoned approach to counseling and risk management practice.

testimonalData.text: Farbstein & Blackman provided exceptional legal advice and representation. I highly recommend their services.

testimonalData.text: The team at Farbstein & Blackman is truly dedicated to their clients' success. I am grateful for their expertise.

testimonalData.text: I was impressed by the professionalism and efficiency of Farbstein & Blackman. They exceeded my expectations.
